ProcedureHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: PROC DQSRVADM
    <HOST=host-name>
    <PORT=job-port-number>
    <OUT=output-data-set>; 

The DQSRVADM procedure creates a data set that provides the name, type, and description of all 
dfPower Architect and dfPower Profile jobs that ran or that are running on a specified port on 
a DataFlux Integration Server. Status information is provided for all jobs that have a log file 
on the server.

ProcedureOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: HOST=host-name] 
      
Identifies the host of the DataFlux Integration Server. The local host is the default 
if this option is not specified.

[Syntax: PORT=port-number] 
      
Identifies the port through which the local host communicates with the Integration Server. 
If the value is not specified, or the value is 0 or a negative number, the default port
number is used. The default port number is 21036.

[Syntax: OUT=output-data-set] 
      
Identifies the storage location of the job status data set.
